body: do we have a test for this? (that the error message is triggered correctly)

Yes, there is a test to ensure that a streaming insert error raises an exception:

`TestToGBQIntegration.test_google_upload_errors_should_raise_exception()`

Test results from my local environment:


always like to exercise error message as I have seen the formatting cause an error itself.
